Package ulb.infof307.g04.view

Class StoreViewController

java.lang.Object
ulb.infof307.g04.view.AbstractViewController
ulb.infof307.g04.view.StoreViewController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable, IStoreViewController, IViewController
public class StoreViewController extends AbstractViewController implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, IStoreViewController
FXML companion to organise the Store view.

The store view shows all user-shared decks
